paragraph.heading: 1Updating an archive
paragraph.paragraph:
After recompiling a project, measures are liable to have changed, and then, the archive created for this file -if any- is probably out of date. To update an archive, you mist have already clicked on
16 16 /images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_delete_small_color.gif 0 in the "Metric" tab of the contexttool.

list.item: In the "Update archive" frame, click on "Browse".
Select the archive file of the current system.
